caption: b'Stronger roads for up to 30,000 cars a day! :automobile: That\xe2\x80\x99s the new Las Calzadas, the freshly-paved streets in Northeast Mexico covering an area of 100,000 m2. We are proud to have participated in this project by supplying hydraulic concrete, a rapid-setting product that is ready to go just three days after application. :Mexico:'

b'We keep working for a low-carbon future. At CEMEX we endeavor to develop and adapt new technology to help us achieve our ambition to deliver a net-zero CO2 concrete globally, and this project is no exception. We are proud to share that the U.S. Department of Energy has awarded us a grant for a carbon capture feasibility study in collaboration with Membrane Technology and Research (MTR) at our Balcones plant in New Braunfels, Texas. There we will install a new membrane technology on the plant\xe2\x80\x99s production process, which will act as a semi-permeable barrier to facilitate the capture of CO2 emissions and, in time, develop a system that optimizes cement process while minimizing capture costs. This technology combines our expertise with MTR\xe2\x80\x99s for a more sustainable future. \n\n#buildingabetterfuture #sustainability #climatechange #climateaction'

b'At CEMEX we\xe2\x80\x99re committed to building a low-carbon future, which is why we\xe2\x80\x99ve joined forces with Synhelion to create the first-ever solar-driven cement plant. Through our joint research we\xe2\x80\x99ve developed a solar receiver that captures heat from the sun and converts it to provide process heat at unparalleled temperatures beyond 1,500 \xc2\xb0C, closing the carbon cycle by turning CO2 into clean solar fuels\xe2\x80\x94becoming the very first initiative to comprehensively decarbonize the cement industry. :sun_selector: Look out for the launch of our pilot plant in 2022 for a sunnier future!'

b'Hemos logrado un gran avance para que la construccio\xcc\x81n neutra en carbono se convierta en realidad. Vertua, nuestro primer concreto con 0 emisiones netas de CO2, \xc2\xa1pronto estara\xcc\x81 disponible a nivel mundial! Este concreto, el cual ya ha sido aplicado en proyectos clave en Europa, logra una reduccio\xcc\x81n de hasta el 70% en las emisiones de carbono incorporadas y compensa el resto a trave\xcc\x81s de acciones como la reforestacio\xcc\x81n. :deciduous_tree: \xc2\xa1Estamos muy orgullosos de anunciar este paso en nuestra estrategia de accio\xcc\x81n clima\xcc\x81tica!'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99ve reached a milestone toward carbon neutral construction becoming a reality. Vertua, our first-ever net-zero CO2 concrete, will soon become available worldwide! This concrete, which has already been successfully supplied to key projects in Europe, achieves up to a 70% reduction in embodied carbon emissions, and offsets the rest through actions like reforestation. :deciduous_tree: We are so proud to announce this leap forward in our climate action strategy! Link in bio.\n\nHemos logrado un gran avance para que la construccio\xcc\x81n neutra en carbono se convierta en realidad. Vertua, nuestro primer concreto con 0 emisiones netas de CO2, \xc2\xa1pronto estara\xcc\x81 disponible a nivel mundial! Este concreto, el cual ya ha sido aplicado en proyectos clave en Europa, logra una reduccio\xcc\x81n de hasta el 70% en las emisiones de carbono incorporadas y compensa el resto a trave\xcc\x81s de acciones como la reforestacio\xcc\x81n. :deciduous_tree: Estamos muy orgullosos de anunciar este paso en nuestra estrategia de accio\xcc\x81n clima\xcc\x81tica!'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99ve reached a milestone toward carbon neutral construction becoming a reality. Vertua, our first-ever net-zero CO2 concrete, will soon become available worldwide! This concrete, which has already been successfully supplied to key projects in Europe, achieves up to a 70% reduction in embodied carbon emissions, and offsets the rest through actions like reforestation. :deciduous_tree: We are so proud to announce this leap forward in our climate action strategy! Link in bio.'

b"Hello from the Sunshine State!:sun_selector: We're in Sunny Isles, Florida, working on another amazing project we can't wait to show you. Thanks @rebelrielly for the great shots! Don\xe2\x80\x99t forget to tag your photos @CEMEX if you see us rolling! #KeepRolling :United_States:"

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re Top Performers! Our 2019 Integrated Report, Innovating for a Better World, has been recognized by the World Business Council for Sustainable Development #WBCSD and @radleyyeldar in this year\xe2\x80\x99s #ReportingMatters. This annual publication reviews member company sustainability reports, showing continued progress in corporate sustainability reporting and disclosure. #BuildingABetterFuture https://www.cemex.com/investors/reports/home :globe_showing_Europe-Africa:\n\n\xc2\xa1Excelentes resultados! Nuestro Reporte Integrado 2019, Innovando para un mundo mejor, fue reconocido por el Consejo Empresarial Mundial para el Desarrollo Sostenible #WBCSD y @radleyyeldar en esta edici\xc3\xb3n de #ReportingMatters. Esta publicaci\xc3\xb3n anual califica el desempe\xc3\xb1o de los informes de sostenibilidad de las empresas miembro, mostrando un progreso continuo en los informes y divulgaci\xc3\xb3n de sostenibilidad corporativa. #ConstruyendoUnMejorFuturo https://www.cemex.com/investors/reports/home :globe_showing_Europe-Africa:'

b'#CEMEX has taken the lead in "green" financing by successfully extending our Facilities Agreement with one of the largest sustainability-linked loans in the world. This agreement allows us to improve our debt maturity profile and underscores our commitment to sustainability. Learn more at the link in bio. $CX'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re proud to present our collaboration with sculptor Kurt Gebauer, a one-of-a-kind project for us! :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: We worked with Gebauer, a legend of Czech fine arts, to bring this great sculpture to life by providing sand from our Kluk sandpit, in the Czech Republic. The final result was an impressive work of 1,200 tons and 42 meters in length, 12 meters in width, and 2.6 meters in height. We couldn\xe2\x80\x99t be more excited to have met this artistic challenge and support the work of this internationally acclaimed artist. :smiling_face_with_sunglasses:'

b'Biodiversity conservation is one of our priorities. For 26 years we have promoted appreciation for the environment through projects, collaborations, and books. This year, 12 of our programs reached Conservation Certification status, with a total of 15 qualifying projects, and we received their most prestigious honor, the Corporate Conservation Leadership Award. We would like to thank the Wildlife Habitat Council for this honor, which inspires us to keep working for a #BetterEnvironment. :trophy::flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone::globe_showing_Americas:'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re creating connections in Poland :Indonesia: with the recent construction of the A2 highway, a 15 km long project to link Min\xcc\x81sk Mazowiecki to the country\xe2\x80\x99s capital. Our team collaborated for two years with client #POLAQUA, providing ready-mix concrete to cover more than 35,000 m2 for the construction of bridge facilities and over 230 thousand tonnes of aggregates for the pavement\xe2\x80\x99s layers; quality materials for a quality highway! :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: Photo Credits: Polish Gerenal Directorate for National Road (GDDKiA)  #buildingabetterfuture #cemex'

b'Is the sun the key to decarbonizing cement? :thinking_face: Today we announced that, in partnership with Synhelion, we\xe2\x80\x99re working on a groundbreaking technology designed to fully decarbonize the cement manufacturing process based on solar energy. The radically new approach is based on replacing fossil fuels in cement plants with high-temperature solar heat, capturing 100% of carbon emissions. We will make carbon neutral concrete a reality! :bright_button: #buildingabetterfuture #carbonneutrality #climateaction #netzero #zeroemissions'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re working non-stop for health in Madrid, Spain! :Spain: Since July we have collaborated in the construction of a hospital with 1,000 beds to treat and research epidemics, supplying 9,000 m3 of concrete. This project will strive to become a point of reference in research when it opens its doors in November. :hospital::flexed_biceps: We are so proud to participate in such an essential project, carried out under the strictest safety regulations.'

b'We are proud to become the first in our sector to target a CO2 reduction in our European operations of at least 55% by 2030 in line with the new European Union aspirations and targets. More at the link in bio. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone:\n\n#buildingabetterfuture #sustainability #climatechange #environment #circulareconomy'

b'We are committed to continue advancing our diligent carbon reduction, which has included initiatives such as substituting 60% of fossil fuels with alternative fuel sources and the introduction of the first carbon-neutral concrete, #Vertua, in the UK and France. More at the link in bio. :globe_showing_Europe-Africa:\n\n#buildingabetterfuture #sustainability #climatechange #environment #circulareconomy'

b'Our #ClimateAction is yielding results in Europe. Our European operations are expected to reach a 35% reduction in cement carbon emissions by the end of 2020, 10 years ahead of the CEMEX global target for 2030. More at the link in bio. :European_Union:\n\n#buildingabetterfuture #sustainability #climatechange #environment #circulareconomy'

b'Thank you, crew, for all you do! :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: With operations in 56 maritime terminals strategically distributed through six continents, our maritime crew enables us to deliver our high-quality construction materials globally. In this photo, the UK Coastguard conducts safety drills with our ships. Do you know someone working at our terminals, or are you part of our team? Comment a :construction_worker: below if so! #WorldMaritimeDay'

b'We are thrilled that for the third time, @fortunemag included #CEMEX in its #ChangeTheWorld list for 2020, which highlights companies around the world that have generated social impact through activities that are part of their business strategy. The publication recognized our work in Mexico, as we built mobile hospitals with highly durable precast antibacterial concrete modules in record time. This effort will be soon replicated in other countries where we operate as we keep contributing to solving global challenges.  More at fortune.com/change-the-world/2020/ :globe_showing_Asia-Australia::flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone:'

b'A net-zero CO2 concrete IS POSSIBLE. :wind_face::leaf_fluttering_in_wind:We are taking action to drive down emissions through our Global CO2 Roadmap, which outlines a strategic vision to ensure the transition to a low-carbon economy. In the last 30 years we have reduced our CO2 emissions by more than 22%, and are now working towards a net-zero CO2 concrete globally by 2050. #ZeDay #ZeroEmissionsDay'

b'Be a peace builder. :dove: This International Day of Peace we are joining the conversation to build a peaceful future. The distancing brought on by #COVID19 has shown us the importance of caring for each other and the value of unity beyond geographic and cultural borders. Now more than ever, as we adapt to the new normal, we know that peace is central to our global well-being. #peaceday #UN75'
b'Happy Friday! Don\xe2\x80\x99t forget to wear your mask over the weekend :eyes::face_with_medical_mask:. Shout out to our friends at @cemex_dominicana for sharing this amazing shot. #KeepRolling'

b'Are you an architecture student? Researcher? Artist? Well this might interest you! :smiling_face_with_sunglasses:Architect Brandon Clifford joined us via Zoom for a round of \xe2\x80\x9cThis or That.\xe2\x80\x9d We have been collaborating with @thebrandonclifford and his design lab, Matter Design, to develop intelligent and easy-to-move concrete, a project that was recently named a R+D Award winner by @architectmag. Check out his answers! :eyes: #OneOnOne'

b'Through CEMEX Ventures, we signed an agreement with Carbon Clean to develop the largest carbon capture facility in the cement industry by 2021, at the lowest commercial cost possible. Studies and an industrial scale-pilot project will begin soon at a CEMEX facility as we move forward with the ambition to deliver net-zero CO2 concrete globally by 2050. :globe_showing_Americas:#BuildingAbetterfuture'

b'Hats off to our Dominican team! :Dominican_Republic: We\xe2\x80\x99re proud to share that we\xe2\x80\x99ve once again earned the ISO 9001 and 14001 certifications in our Santo Domingo and San Pedro de Marcor\xc3\xads plants, in the Dominican Republic. These certifications recognize our practices in quality and environmental management. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: @cemex_dominicana #BuildingABetterFuture'
location_name: San Pedro de Macorís, Dominican Republic

caption: b'At the impressive height of 1,228 meters above the sea :water_wave:, the New Adrion Skywalk observation deck offers astonishing views of Croatia\xe2\x80\x99s landscapes. :Croatia: The glass-floored project was created to promote the sustainable use of National Park Biokovo, and thus required the most durable materiales. To achieve this, we supplied a special concrete resistant to frost and salt to withstand the weathering. Skywalk is open to the public since early July. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone:'

b'Our operations are certified as 100% environmentally responsible! :Colombia: We\xe2\x80\x99re proud to announce that we received the ISO 14001 certification through our Colombian cement operations, a great achievement in our work for a #BetterEnvironment. :raising_hands_medium-light_skin_tone: @cemexcolombia'

b'A beautiful afternoon in London :United_Kingdom:, made even better by safety measures! Remember to keep washing your hands and wearing your mask\xe2\x80\x94and don\xe2\x80\x99t forget to tag us if you see us. #KeepRolling'

b'We are proud to be members of the Global Cement and Concrete Association @the.gcca as it launches its \xe2\x80\x982050 Climate Ambition,\xe2\x80\x99 demonstrating a #ConcreteAmbition to continuing to drive down the CO2 footprint of our operations & products as we aspire to deliver #CarbonNeutralConcrete by 2050. More: https://gccassociation.org/climate-ambition \n\n#ConcreteAmbition #SustainableConcrete #CarbonNeutralConcrete #CEMEX'

b'This project has us dreaming of future trips! :airplane_selector: We revamped the Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport, the busiest airport in the world, by supplying nearly 15,000 tons of cement to improve its 3,776 meters of runway and taxiway. In collaboration with @McCarthyImprovement, we worked on this expansion and makeover that required 24/7 cement deliveries from our plant in Clinchfield, Georgia, and a recent additional supply of 4,000 tons of cement. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone::United_States: @cemex_usa'

To make its construction possible, we installed a Vince Hagan dosing plant to pour approximately 400 m3 of concrete a day and used up to 12 mixers daily to distribute the product on-site! :smiling_face_with_sunglasses: @cemexmx :Mexico:'

b'"Poetry and Structure in Motion"\xe2\x80\x94that\'s what @architectmag calls our collaboration with @thebrandonclifford and Matter Design. Our award-winning project, Walking Assembly, is a work that rethinks the way we build by using variable density concrete to create great construction units that are durable and easy to move just by hand. Check out our video call interview and learn more about the mind behind! :light_bulb:'

b'Our number one priority has always been the safety of our collaborators, customers, and communities, and we are doing everything we can to put them first during this time. At CEMEX we have always been and continue to be deeply committed to building a better future, and it is with this in mind that we keep joining efforts to build community. We are proud to be a team that works together and is stronger with each challenge we face. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: \n\n#covid19 #buildingcommunity #buildingabetterfuture #cemex'

b"Our volunteers were working hard in Mazatl\xc3\xa1n, Mexico, to sanitize the city's ports! :Mexico: We keep #BuildingCommunityTogether with every sanitization our team carries out. Thank you for your commitment! :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone:"

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re rolling in Mexico City! :Mexico: Our mixers are here to remind us all of proper mask use and other safety recommendations. Have you spotted us yet? Tag us if you see us! #KeepRolling :eyes:'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re creating connections between the Vyso\xc4\x8dina Region, Czech Republic\xe2\x80\x94which is home to three UNESCO World Heritage Sites :face_screaming_in_fear:\xe2\x80\x94and the busiest highway in the country. So far, we\xe2\x80\x99ve supplied 5,000 m3 of concrete for this technically-demanding structure of five bridges and a traffic circle, which surpasses 4 km in length. We continuously poured 1,165 m3 of concrete performed over 22 hours for one of these bridges. Thank you @colas_cz for trusting us with your project! :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone:'

b'We deliver quality to the most magical places! We helped build the extension of Les Clos de Paulilles\xe2\x80\x99s wine cellar, an iconic vineyard and a \xe2\x80\x9cGrand Site de France.\xe2\x80\x9d :France: We supplied a high-specialty concrete with an additive to avoid water streaks and a hyperfluid concrete to create a new floor. We successfully followed precautions to work through the COVID-19 pandemic and ensure the reopening of the winery, reception site, and restaurant by the sea on June 17. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: @cemex_france #BuildingaBetterFuture'

b'Our team in Trinidad and Tobago is still going strong! Throughout this time, our volunteers have been deeply committed to sanitizing public spaces in the country. This time we worked with the Trinidad and Tobago Fire Services to sanitize the Harris Promenade, in San Fernando. :Trinidad_&_Tobago: :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: @trinidadcementlimited #BuildingCommunityTogether'

b'Warsaw Brewery is about to begin a new chapter in its story, turning into the Meeting and Flavors District of the Polish capital. We collaborated closely on this turnkey project\xe2\x80\x94where we provide not only materials, but also our expertise\xe2\x80\x94and helped our client chose white concrete for its surfaces because of its important sustainable benefits in flooring applications, such as better reflectivity of light which reduces the necessity for excessive lighting and thus cuts energy costs. :Poland::flexed_biceps: @cemex_pl #BuildingaBetterFuture'

b'We just collaborated to sanitize the historic Sam Sharpe Square in Jamaica! :Jamaica: We are proud to continue working with partners and #BuildingCommunityTogether. This project allowed us to look after the health and safety of the people of Jamaica, while paying tribute to one of the country\xe2\x80\x99s National Heroes. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: @caribcementja'
b'Meet our global brands! Wherever you are, and whatever your project, we have the right solution for you. Visit cemex.com to find your local representative or nearest CEMEX location. #CEMEXPLAINS'

b"We're proud to be a founding partner of #INNOVANDI, a network that works to enable pre-competitive collaborative research intended to increase concrete\xe2\x80\x99s #sustainability and help fight #climatechange. During Innovandi kick-off week, industrial and academic partners will set the key themes for future research projects to improve sustainability and decrease CO2 emissions. Learn more at the link in bio. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: @the.gcca"

b'Emotions are running high in our G\xc3\xbcstrow, Germany, site, :Germany: where we are supporting the shoreside assembly and test set up of the longest roller coaster aboard a cruise ship, the Space Cruiser. :face_screaming_in_fear:Our existing infrastructure allowed for a trouble-free power supply to test this extraordinary @maurer_rides project. We\xe2\x80\x99re excited to see it take off next year! :water_wave::roller_coaster::passenger_ship: @dreamcruiseline'

b'Cozy, no? This is just one of the incredible corners created at Casa Roel, a home by Felipe Assadi, Francisca Pulido, and Isaac Broid. The house is arranged in an \xe2\x80\x9cH\xe2\x80\x9d scheme, with nooks, gardens, workspaces, and a terrace that offers an incredible view of Mexico City. Casa Roel scored the third place in the 2015 #CEMEXBuildingAward, in the Housing category.'

b'A project like this one unites us! :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: During this challenging time we have come together with governments and partners to support Mexico, especially in the area it most needs it now: healthcare infrastructure. These efforts allowed us to develop nine hospital modules in different cities\xe2\x80\x94all in just 30 days! Watch our IGTV video to learn more about this fascinating project. :Mexico: @cemexmx \n#BuildingCommunityTogether #covid19 #buildingabetterfuture'

b'Teamwork makes us stronger. We recently collaborated with Jamaica Pre-Mix to sanitize the Papine, St. William Grant, and Nelson Mandela parks in Jamaica. Three crews covered these locations within two hours\xe2\x80\x94a great project to commemorate the past Labor Day in the country! #BuildingCommunityTogether. @caribcementja :Jamaica:'

b'We are proud to support the construction of a new healthcare facility in Beroun, Czech Republic. We supplied 13,000 m3 of concrete for the new pavilion at a hospital in the city, something especially important during the #COVID19 pandemic. The construction industry is essential for economic recovery, thank you to all our customers who continue to trust us with their projects. @cemex.cz :Czechia:'

b'We want to take a moment to thank our incredible team. Every single one of you have shown resilience and determination during this crisis, and we are deeply inspired and grateful. Let\xe2\x80\x99s keep building a better future together! :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone:'

b'We were hard at work last weekend to sanitize public spaces in Alcanar, Spain. In collaboration with the Alcanar City Hall, we delivered soap and water to a public park, a sports port, and a market to protect the people of the town. #BuildingCommunityTogether :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone::Spain:'

b'Thank you, artisans! Through our partnership with @anspacpanama, up to 15,000 masks will be produced by the craftswomen of our community center. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: Their work will enable the donation of this important protective element to the community. #BuildingCommunityTogether @cemex_panama :Panama:'

b'In honor of the International Day for Biological Diversity, we want to share more about our work protecting the American Bison at El Carmen Nature Reserve. We are proud to work with our partners @aes_mexico, @fondomexicano, @conanp_mx and @smacoahuila to make this goal a reality. #BiodiversityDay :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone:'

b'We take great pride in our workforce diversity, because together we create transformative solutions. This World Day for Cultural Diversity, we celebrate our team of more than 40,000 collaborators across the world. Let\xe2\x80\x99s keep building a better future together. :Mexico::United_States::Colombia::United_Arab_Emirates::Switzerland::Dominican_Republic::Czechia::Costa_Rica::Bahamas::Germany::France::Spain::Egypt::United_Kingdom::Guatemala::Nicaragua::Philippines::Panama::Puerto_Rico::Jamaica: #ShareCulture #BuildingAbetterFuture #Diversity'

b'The Archeopark Pavlov :Czechia: is located in one of the most important historical sites in the world, building a bridge between universal cultural heritage sites and the Czech Republic\xe2\x80\x99s population. The museum was designed to evoke the Paleolithic age it displays, living partly underground since it is situated in a protected landscape area, between the village boundary and the open countryside. This project won the 2017 International Collective Space #CEMEXBuildingAward. :eyes:'

b'Casa BC is a place of isolation for reflection and rest that provides a space away from the urban to be intertwined with the natural environment. The project by @3archmx landed the number one spot in the Housing category of the 2015 #CEMEXBuildingAward. @cemexmx :Mexico:'

b"Take a look at bright, beautiful Mulini Beach. :Croatia: For this project, which was deeply influenced by its surroundings, we designed a high-strength white concrete with lasting durability, to endure its exposure to seawater. But this isn't its only great feature\xe2\x80\x94this project was also the first place winner in the International Congruence Accessibility category of the 2015 #CEMEXBuildingAward. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone:#ConstructionIsEssential"

b'Thank you to the women of our CEMEX Community Centers for all your hard work during #COVID19! With raw materials, they have been working hard from home to produce more than 400 liters of hand sanitizer and +11,000 face masks, to be donated to health centers across Mexico. :face_with_medical_mask: Thank you for #BuildingCommunityTogether with us. :raising_hands_medium-light_skin_tone: @cemexmx :Mexico:'

b'@migueldelatorrearquitectos is a team of architects, engineers, and designers that create under the direction of architect Miguel de la Torre. Here, you can see some of their exemplary work with Bartolache 1944, completed in 2015. The project was a winner in the Housing Complex category of the #CEMEXBuildingAward during the same year. :raising_hands_medium-light_skin_tone::Mexico: #ConstructionIsEssential @cemexmx'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re dressing up to say thanks! :raising_hands_medium-light_skin_tone: Our vehicles are rolling in the UK :United_Kingdom: with a message of appreciation for all health care and essential workers in the frontlines. If you spot us on the road, tag your photos @cemex and join us in saying thank you. Also, a shout out to Peter, our driver, for sharing his story with us. We are also proud of you being in our team. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: #ClapForOurCarers #ClapForTheNHS #BuildingCommunityTogether #covid19'

b'A library should be a community haven, which is exactly what the Frontignan Media Centre provides in the eco-district of the Pielles. It was built to blend in with the neighborhood, with a signature "lived-in" look. This reading and consultation space was awarded second place in the Building category at the 2016 International #CEMEXBuildingAward. :France: #ConstructionIsEssential'

b"We're #BuildingCommunityTogether in the Phillipines :Philippines: with different actions! :raising_hands_medium-light_skin_tone: 27,500 capsules of Vitamin C, 500 sacks of rice, 135 gallons of ethyl alcohol, and hundreds of canned goods and sanitizing products were distributed to affected communities in the country. Additionally, we helped set up sanitation tents to stop the further spread of #COVID19 among its people."

b'The Oak House School building was carefully designed by the Spanish firm Trasbordo Arquitectura. For this project, we provided a tailor-made concrete with special heat transfer and resistance levels, which resulted in a lower energy demand and a win for the environment. This project was awarded third place in the Sustainable Building category at the 2016 International #CEMEXBuildingAward. :Spain: #ConstructionIsEssential'

b"In Mexico :Mexico:, we've carried out close to 30 sanitizations in just 15 days! :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: Thanks to the great work of all our partners, local governments, and volunteers, we have been able to sanitize key areas in different cities across the country. We\xe2\x80\x99ll keep rolling to protect our communities. #BuildingCommunityTogether"

b'Let\xe2\x80\x99s keep taking care of each other! :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: Following preventive measures is essential in the continuing fight against #COVID19, and yesterday we lit up our Cement Plant in Monterrey, Mexico, to highlight this. Using a silo, we projected a special video to encourage us all to continue #BuildingCommunityTogether. @cemexmx :Mexico:'

b'Casa de Los Samanes was created to reflect its owner\xe2\x80\x99s passion for engineering and design, while blending in with the surrounding Colombian landscapes. Its minimalist design takes center stage and places a special focus on long-term sustainability. This project was the third place winner of our 2016 International #CEMEXBuildingAward, in the Residential Housing category. :Colombia: #ConstructionIsEssential'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re giving back to the communities! :smiling_face_with_sunglasses: We\xe2\x80\x99re proud to say we donated our harvest from our Assiut farm, where vegetables are grown. The essential produce was destined for vulnerable groups in orphanages and nursing homes in Egypt. :Egypt: #BuildingCommunityTogether'

b"We're lending a hand with hand sanitizer. :waving_hand_medium-light_skin_tone: This past weeks, our CEMEX Admixtures plant in Salzkotten, Germany :Germany:, produced enough hand sanitizer for at least 10,000 people. Our goal is to alleviate the shortage of this important resource with a formula that follows WHO specifications. In the coming weeks we'll be working hard to produce a stock for the next six months, a part of which will be donated to local communities in this country. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: #FlattenTheCurve #BuildingCommunityTogether #COVID19"

b'The construction industry keeps communications systems functioning, creates and maintains critical transport infrastructure, and keeps society\xe2\x80\x99s basic needs running\xe2\x80\x94and during this time, it has proved essential to repair and build healthcare centers, as well as to help out in any way we can. Today we are releasing our position paper on the key role our industry plays, and how we\xe2\x80\x99re doing our job safely. To learn more, go to cemex.com/covid19 or click the link in bio. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone:'

b"We keep rolling to protect the health of our communities! :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: In collaboration with Egypt's National Cancer Institute :Egypt:, we recently delivered water and soap with our mixer trucks to sanitize the vital areas and entrances of this hospital in New Cairo. Thank you to everyone who supports this important initiative! @cemex_egypt #BuildingCommunityTogether"

b'We make a great team! :tiger_face::soccer_ball: We joined efforts with @clubtigresoficial to sanitize a vital public hospital in Monterrey, Mexico. Joining us was the Club\xe2\x80\x99s mascot, Tigre, and our amazing volunteer staff. Thank you all! :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: #BuildingCommunityTogether  #UnTigreNuncaDejaSoloAotroTigre'

b'Alicante General Hospital will soon be relieved with 400 new hospital beds! :Spain: We supplied 1,000 m3 of concrete to help build this temporary hospital in Spain, which took just two weeks to build. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: This annex to the General Hospital is one of the three temporary health centers we have helped build in the country to support the fight against #COVID19. #FlattenTheCurve'

b'We lit up to recognize the incredible work of healthcare and essential workers! :clapping_hands_medium-light_skin_tone: :clapping_hands_medium-light_skin_tone::clapping_hands_medium-light_skin_tone: As a thank you for their courage and resilience, our cement  plant in Rugby, UK :United_Kingdom: projected this special animation this week. No video could ever express our profound gratitude, but we want to take this opportunity to once again say: THANK YOU! #ClapForOurCarers #ClapForKeyWorkers #FlattenTheCurve #COVID19 #BuildingCommunityTogether'

b"Now sanitizing in Puerto Rico! :Puerto_Rico: We're joining efforts with the Department of Ornato and Public Work of the Autonomous Municipality of Ponce, at the heart of our operations in the country, to deliver soap and water. Yesterday we sanitized the Historic Zone, and this weekend we'll continue our work at other areas to keep fighting the spread of #COVID19. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: #BuildingCommunityTogether #FlattenTheCurve @cemexpuertorico"

b'We donated 400 kg of clementines this week in Alicante, Spain! :Spain: The fruits were part of a breakfast meal destined for those most vulnerable during this quarantine, and were delivered at a shelter in the same city. We\'re proud to say the clementines come from our very own orchard "El Clotet," a restored quarry now converted to produce quality citrus.:tangerine:#BuildingCommunityTogether #FlattenTheCurve'

b'Colombia\xe2\x80\x99s biggest central market was sanitized this weekend, and we were there to help. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: Our mixers delivered soap and water to disinfect the market\xe2\x80\x99s 180,000 m\xc2\xb2, striving to decrease the risk of contagion for shoppers. Thank you @revistasemana and @estebanvegalr for the great shot of these efforts!'

b'More than 1,000 m\xc2\xb2 are sanitized for every m\xc2\xb3 of water and soap our team delivers! :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: Over the past few days in Mexico :Mexico: we have been working hard to sanitize more public areas, striving to protect the health and safety of our communities. Big thanks to everyone involved! :clapping_hands_medium-light_skin_tone: #FlattenTheCurve #BuildingCommunityTogether @cemexmx'

b"Our global community keeps working together to deal with the #COVID19 pandemic. In Egypt :Egypt:, we've partnered with the government of Assiut and Assiut University to use our mixer trucks to sanitize key spaces in the city. These include the university's campus and the entrances to hospitals preparing to care for #coronavirus patients. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone:#BuildingCommunityTogether @cemex_egypt"

b"Working together matters now more than ever. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: That's why in the Czech Republic :Czechia: we were proud to donate protective equipment to two hospitals, a fire brigade, and a local doctor's office in need of face masks. We also used our Prachovice laboratory to produce 600 liters of hand sanitizer, a key tool for strengthening hand hygiene so we can #FlattenTheCurve. #BuildingCommunityTogether #COVID19 @cemex.cz"

b'And now the Dominican Republic! :Dominican_Republic: Our Dominican team has begun delivering soap and water with our mixers, and during this weekend sanitized streets and public health areas. We\xe2\x80\x99re proud to know our safety efforts are extending everywhere. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: #BuildingCommunityTogether #FlattenTheCurve #COVID19 @cemex_dominicana'

b'Thank you, Colombia, for all your kind encouragement! :Colombia::clapping_hands_medium-light_skin_tone: This week we were proud to help by delivering soap and water with our mixers in Medell\xc3\xadn, Bogot\xc3\xa1, Barranquilla, and Bucaramanga. Our priority is the safety of our communities, and we\xe2\x80\x99ll keep doing everything we can to look after them. #BuildingCommunityTogether #FlattenTheCurve #COVID19'

b'We delivered almost 3000 m3 of concrete to help build temporary hospitals in Valencia, Alicante, and Castell\xc3\xb3n, Spain. :Spain: Thanks to our fast-setting concrete, work could swiftly begin at these health centers, where more than a thousand #COVID19 patients will soon be able to receive the medical attention they need. #FlattenTheCurve'

b"We're doing our part for a safer Mexico! :Mexico: Today, our mixers delivered soap and water in Nuevo Le\xc3\xb3n to sanitize outside public health areas, an important step for the safety of our essential workers and our entire community. :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: #BuildingCommunityTogether #FlattenTheCurve #COVID19 @cemexmx"

b'From cement bags to flour bags!:smiling_face_with_sunglasses: Our team in Trinidad & Tobago :Trinidad_&_Tobago: is dedicating their packaging production to create flour bags, so that the community can still have access to this essential food staple. It is now more important than ever to show solidarity with those around us, and become stronger together. #FlattenTheCurve #BuildingCommunityTogether #COVID19\n\nPhoto Credits: @trinidadcementlimited'

b'So... we did it again! Today, our mixers in Panama :Panama: and Colombia :Colombia: delivered soap and water to sanitize areas for medical attention, plus other popular zones to help #FlattenTheCurve. We\xe2\x80\x99re proud to be everywhere our communities need us most, together we fight against #COVID19. :oncoming_fist_medium-light_skin_tone::microbe:'

b"Together we can beat #COVID_19! :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone:To support medical efforts in Colombia :Colombia:, our mixers are bringing a special soap and water mixture to sanitize Corfer\xc3\xadas Bogot\xc3\xa1 which will soon become the biggest temporary hospital in the city. With joint actions like this, we'll get through this together!:clapping_hands_medium-light_skin_tone: @cemexcolombia"

b'Our 2019 Integrated Report \xe2\x80\x9cInnovating For A Better World\xe2\x80\x9d is out today. Each year, we aim to provide a more transparent insight into our global operations, and here you\xe2\x80\x99ll find a holistic analysis of our company\xe2\x80\x99s strategic vision, performance, governance, value creation, and our deep commitment to build a more sustainable future for all. Link in bio. #BuildingABetterFuture'

b'More than just concrete mixers! We know innovation and creativity are key to build community during difficult times, which is why our team is continually looking for ways to stand behind the professionals battling #COVID_19. Today our concrete mixers rolled with great purpose in Panama :Panama:, where we are using them to sanitize the areas around the @csspanama health centers with a specially-formulated soap and measured water, to create a safer environment for patients and frontliners.:man_construction_worker_light_skin_tone::flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone: Video Credits :movie_camera:: @tvnnoticias @csspanama @cemex_panama'

b'We are so thankful to all the doctors, nurses, and first responders working tirelessly to battle #COVID19. You are deeply admired and appreciated by all of us at CEMEX.:clapping_hands: #ApplauseForMedicalWorkers'

b'If you\xe2\x80\x99re not able to stay home, the @who recommends maintaining at least 1-meter distance between yourself and others. This way, everyone is safe from breathing in fluids released during coughs or sneezes, which helps #FlattenTheCurve :flexed_biceps_medium-light_skin_tone:'

b"During this uncertain time, our thoughts are with everyone who's been affected by the global COVID-19 pandemic. Help us build a better future by staying safe, so we can #FlattenTheCurve. Stay informed through your local health authorities and take all recommended precautions. We are in this together. #CoronaVirus"

b'Filter o no filter? Get the best photography tips from Cristina Mittermeier, founder of the International League of Conservation Photographers\xc2\xa0and a National Geographic Woman of Impact. For more than 25 years, Cristina has also been the editor of our Nature Book Series. Get our newest edition here:\xc2\xa0cemexnature.com/books @mitty'

b'Let\xe2\x80\x99s take action for a more equal world. Join us in saying, why not?\nGender equality matters to us and we\xe2\x80\x99re taking action to move it forward. At CEMEX women find a safe working environment with opportunities for personal and professional growth through our Learning and Leadership Development offering. We are committed to increase representation at all levels in the organization and to continue developing our workforce experience to provide flexibility and secure equal opportunities for all. #InternationalWomensDay #IWD2020 #EachforEqual'

b'We are taking action to tackle one of the biggest challenges of our times, #ClimateChange. Today we are proud to announce our ambitious strategy which includes delivering a net-zero CO2 concrete by 2050. Learn more at the link in bio.\n#Sustainability #ClimateAction #SDG13'

b'Community, wellness, efficiency and the environment are the key inspirations behind the new Bioengineering Center at @tecdemonterrey in Quer\xc3\xa9taro, M\xc3\xa9xico. The building is an expansion project for bioengineering students and teachers, and was designed with innovations that made it the Sustainable Building of the year at the 2019 #CEMEXBuildingAward. One of its great characteristics is the architectural design that allows passive air conditioning and energy saving.:light_bulb:'

b'This one\xe2\x80\x99s a winner. Meet Solaz Los Cabos, the first place in the Building category of the 2019 #CEMEXBuildingAward. A project by Sordo Madaleno Arquitectos, @solazresortloscabos is a beachfront resort that extends over 9.8 hectares of the unique topography of Baja California Sur, Mexico. The entire complex follows an incredible vision of integration with its natural surroundings with materials that allow this incorporation, such as wood, brass, and bronze. :Mexico: @cemexmx'
location_name: Solaz, A Luxury Collection Resort, Los Cabos

caption: b'Are you already dreaming of warmer days? :smiling_face_with_sunglasses: We\xe2\x80\x99re longing for a summer afternoon at Riviera Water Park, which scored the third place in the Collective Space category of our 2019 #CEMEXBuildingAward. The aquatic center underwent a hydraulic and urban renovation, and now better redirects and optimizes water distribution from natural channels through reservoirs, bridges, and cascades. It\xe2\x80\x99s an inviting recreational space shining with white concrete surfaces and stainless steel water slides. :water_wave:'

b'Casa Campolivar is a project by Antonio Altarriba Arquitectos that creates a relationship between the artisanal and the technological. The architects explored this relation through the use of different elements; they worked with stone, white textured concrete, glass, and wood to apply this duality to the house\xe2\x80\x99s architecture. :Spain: #CEMEXBuildingAward'

b'Croatian architecture is celebrated with the Business Building within the catering complex Franja. With singular diagonals and spaces full of light, it highlights gable roofs and the Croatian material versatility with a wood and concrete facade. Inside, apparent concrete shines against white furniture and other details. This project was a winner at the 2019 #CEMEXBuildingAward in the Building category. :Croatia:'
